meaning_str.bing:
n. 城堡；堡垒；车
v. 把…置于城堡中；筑城堡防卫；(下国际象棋时)用车护(王)
网络. 灵书妙探；卡索；卡索尔

把…置于城堡中；筑城堡防卫；(下国际象棋时)用车护(王)

城堡；堡垒；宫堡；要塞；（国际象棋中的）车；（Castle）卡斯尔（人名）
将…置于城堡中；给…城堡；盘踞于；安居于

1.en: It was one of my dream-place-to-be, when I was really there the castle itself was a little disappointed.
1.cn: 天鹅堡是我之前非常想去的一个地方，去了后就建筑本身来说有点小失望。

2.en: But a wicked ogre who lives in a great castle beyond the forest cheated your great-grandfather and took it for his own.
2.cn: 但是，住在森林后面大城堡里的妖怪欺骗了您的曾祖父，将这片土地占为己有。

3.en: When the Marauders captured her and took her to their decrepit castle, Noa, Teek and Wicket teamed up to infiltrate the Marauder stronghold.
3.cn: 劫掠者俘虏她，把她带到他们破旧的城堡后，诺亚、蒂克和威基特结伴潜入劫掠者的要塞。

0.en: Remember, the goal is the castle. Get to the castle.
0.cn: 记住，目标是那座城堡，向城堡猛冲过去。

1.en: Who else was living in the castle? Well...
1.cn: 那还有谁住在城堡里呢？还有...

2.en: Daddy's tummy is just like a bouncy castle!
2.cn: 爸爸的肚子就像一个充气城堡！

3.en: And hey, presto, a snow castle. Snow castles.
3.cn: 接着，迅速的拿起桶，一个雪堡就完成了！雪堡完成了！

4.en: Probably didn't hurt that you owned the castle.

5.en: You were invited on a quest to the black castle?
5.cn: 有人邀请你去黑色城堡探险么？

6.en: What the heck's a castle? And that's where we're going.
6.cn: 城堡是什么鬼呀？就是我们要去的地方。

7.en: I love the castle. Oh, dear, it is raining, and the castle has no roof. Let's go to the tree house. No, I'll never leave my castle.
7.cn: 我喜欢这个城堡。噢，糟糕，开始下雨了。但是城堡没有屋顶，我们到树屋里去躲雨吧。不，我绝不会离开我的城堡。

8.en: What's Windy Castle, Daddy? It's a castle on a very high hill. George likes castles. Windy Castle sounds like a boring thing for boys.
8.cn: 什么是风息堡呀，爸爸？是一座城堡，坐落在高山上。乔治喜欢城堡。风息堡对男孩子来说还挺无聊的。

9.en: Now, the bouncy castle. Peppa loves bouncing on the bouncy castle. Everyone loves bouncing on the bouncy castle. This is the best school fete, ever.
9.cn: 我们去玩充气城堡吧。佩琪喜欢在充气城堡上玩。大家都喜欢在充气城堡上玩。这是最好玩的学校游园会了。

10.en: Look. Is that a castle? Yes. It's Windy Castle. Come on, car. Come on, car. You can make it. Hurray.
10.cn: 快看！那是座城堡吗？没错！那就是风息堡！车车加油。车车加油！你一定可以的！好嘞。

11.en: They need lots and lots of sands. They use buckets to make the castle's turrets. What a splendid castle. Hooray.
11.cn: 他们需要很多很多的沙子。他们用水桶来建造城堡的塔楼。很棒的城堡。好诶！

12.en: I'm staying in my castle. I'm staying in my tree house. I'll look after your castle, Danny. I'll look after your tree house, Peppa.
12.cn: 我要呆在我的城堡里面。我要呆在我的树屋里面。我来帮你照看你的城堡，丹尼。你的树屋就交给我吧，佩奇。

13.en: I am the king of the castle. Every castle needs a telephone. Hold this. Keep this string nice and tight and you can talk to the boys.
13.cn: 我是城堡的国王，每一个城堡都需要一个电话。拿着这个。接下来你们拿紧着绳子，就可以跟男孩们说话了。

14.en: I know. We can ring them. Hello? Grandpa Pig. We can see you from Windy Castle. Wave at us. Granny and Grandpa are waving at us. I love Windy Castle.
14.cn: 有了，打电话给他们。喂，你好猪爷爷！我们在风息堡看到你们了！朝我们挥挥手！爷爷和奶奶在朝我们挥手呢！我爱风息堡！

15.en: I know. I know. It's a bouncy castle. Peppa loves bouncy castles.
15.cn: 我知道了我知道了！这是一个充气城堡！佩奇喜欢充气城堡！

16.en: Where did they take him? To the Red Queen's castle at Salazen Grum.
16.cn: 他们会把他抓到哪里去？红皇后的城堡，在萨拉兹格朗。

17.en: And George has made a sand castle. You see, playing together is fun.
17.cn: 乔治也做了一个沙堡。看到吗，大家一起玩很有趣。

18.en: Hermione, you'll be the queenside castle. As for me, I'll be a knight.
18.cn: 赫敏，你就去做后一车，至于我嘛，上马做骑士。

19.en: We will not get lost and I will not get grumpy. Windy Castle, here we come.
19.cn: 我们是不会迷路的，而我也不会变焦躁。出发，风息堡，我们来啦。
